diff_act: 1.Reflect changes in names and icons in real-time across all connected MultiMahjongClient sessions.
3.Provide a graphical interface for administrators to view log information.

regen.absent_element: 1. Real-time update of name and icon across sessions 2. Provide log information to admin
regen.new_specification:
1. The MultiMahjongServer shall ensure real-time updating of player names and icons across all connected MultiMahjongClient sessions to maintain consistent player identification.
2. The MultiMahjongServer GUI shall allow administrators to view log information for monitoring game activities.

regen.absent_element: The ability to offer log information to administrators via GUI
regen.new_specification: The MultiMahjongServer will provide a graphical interface through which the administrator can view log information in real-time.

regen.absent_element: Reflecting real-time updates across all sessions
regen.new_specification: The MultiMahjongServer shall ensure that any name or icon change made by players is reflected in real-time across all connected MultiMahjongClient sessions.

label: The MultiMahjongServer will have a graphical user interface with which the administrator can get log information.
absence: getting log information by administrator through a graphical user interface
